data.description:
Enter the world of ancient martial arts and epic battles with Samurai Ninja Clash. This immersive game allows you to become a legendary ninja or samurai, mastering the art of combat in stunning, realistic environments. Whether you prefer the stealth and agility of a ninja or the strength and discipline of a samurai.

Key Features:
Choose Your Arena: Select from a variety of beautifully rendered fighting arenas, each with unique challenges and atmospheric elements. From tranquil bamboo forests to ancient temples, each location sets the stage for epic battles.
Select Your Fighter: Decide whether to fight as a swift and deadly ninja or a powerful and honorable samurai. Each fighter type offers distinct combat styles and abilities, allowing you to tailor your fighting experience.
Single or Dual Swords: Customize your combat strategy by choosing to fight with a single sword or dual swords. Each option provides different tactical advantages and fighting styles, enhancing the depth of gameplay.
Multiplayer Battles: Challenge your friends and other players in intense multiplayer battles. Create and join rooms to test your skills against real opponents and prove who is the ultimate warrior.
Future Updates: Stay tuned for exciting updates, including new ninja weapons and moves, ensuring that the game evolves with fresh content and challenges.

Prepare to master the art of the blade and claim your place among the legends in Ninja Duel VR. The battle awaits â€“ are you ready?

changelog.change_log: We are excited to introduce the Multiplayer Mode! Now you can enjoy the game with friends and players from around the world.
